column3: Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/8c20bbbed934891fb9e9b5ea90eea610034ad11c for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu

This is not needed anymore, we define all of these in bitcoin-config.h.
It's just a dummy value in case HAVE_CONFIG_H is not defined.
(maybe we should update the comment tho...)

It doesn't hurt, but I think the point of adding the year to configure.ac was that we can update it in one place.
If we keep updating it here we can just as well remove it from the .ac again.

We want to reduce the number of places where it needs to be updated, not increase it.
IMHO it's more obvious to update it in a header...\n
